sentences.sContent: This paper remains a nonpareil platform for writing a column — not just for its readership, but also for its journalistic freedom.
sentences.sContent_eng: This paper remains a nonpareil platform for writing a column — not just for its readership, but also for its journalistic freedom.
sentences.sCn: 它仍然拥有无可匹敌的专栏写作平台——不只为其读者，也为新闻自由。

sentences.sContent: Can McGrady, entering his 11th NBA season, at long last live up to his nonpareil reputation and deliver a blue-collar, crunch-time effort in the post-season?
sentences.sContent_eng: Can McGrady, entering his 11th NBA season, at long last live up to his nonpareil reputation and deliver a blue-collar, crunch-time effort in the post-season?
sentences.sCn: 麦迪即将进入第11个赛季，他能在季后赛的关键时刻咬紧牙关，像那些专干脏活的蓝领队员杀出一条血路，以对得上无上名气吗？

trans.tranOther: having no match or equal; peerless
